targets.query: SELECT mean("rate_payloads_consumed")*1000 FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE (partition_id = '${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.${readout_app}\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT mean("num_buffer_elements") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.${readout_app}\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT sum("data") FROM ( SELECT mean("num_buffer_elements") AS "data" FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.${readout_app}\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null) ) GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.${readout_app}\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_found")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.${readout_app}\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_delayed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.${readout_app}\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_bad")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.${readout_app}\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_old_window")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.${readout_app}\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_timed_out")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.${readout_app}\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_uncategorized")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.${readout_app}\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("tot_request_response_time")/sum("num_requests_handled") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "partition_id"='${partition}' AND  "source_id" =~  /[^.]+\.${readout_app}\.${DLH}/  AND $timeFilter AND "num_requests_handled">0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("tot_request_response_time")/sum("num_requests_handled") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "partition_id"='${partition}' AND  "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.${readout_app}\.${DLH}/ AND "num_requests_handled">0 AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id" fill(null)

SELECT min("min_request_response_time") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "partition_id"='${partition}' AND  "source_id" =~  /[^.]+\.${readout_app}\.${DLH}/ AND  $timeFilter AND "num_requests_handled">0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT max("max_request_response_time") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE "partition_id"='${partition}' AND  "source_id" =~  /[^.]+\.${readout_app}\.${DLH}/  AND $timeFilter AND "num_requests_handled">0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_buffer_cleanups")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.${readout_app}\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_payloads_overwritten")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~  /[^.]+\.${readout_app}\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("num_requests_waiting") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.${readout_app}\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT spread("last_daq_timestamp") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE (partition_id = '${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /.*\.${timestamp_app}\.DLH-\d+/) AND  $timeFilter AND "last_daq_timestamp" > 0  GROUP BY time(500ms) fill(null)

SELECT last("last_daq_timestamp") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE (partition_id = '${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.${timestamp_app}\.DLH-\d+/) AND "last_daq_timestamp">0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT last("last_daq_timestamp") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE (partition_id = '${partition}' AND "source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.${timestamp_app}\.DLH-\d+/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "source_id"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_sent")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id"  =~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tpsets_sent")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("partition_id"='${partition}' AND "source_id"  =~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_send_failed")), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_in_t[sets_send_failed")), 1s) +  non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_suppressed_too_long")), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_tps_suppressed_tardy")), 1s)  FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE ("source_id"  =~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("rate_tp_hits") FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RawDataProcessorInfo" WHERE  ("source_id"  =~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_buffer_cleanups")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id" =~  /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_payloads_overwritten")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE  ("source_id" =~  /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.${DLH}/ )  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE ("source_id" =~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_found")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id"  =~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_delayed")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id"  =~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_bad")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id"  =~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_old_window")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id"  =~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_timed_out")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id"  =~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("num_requests_uncategorized")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.RequestHandlerInfo" WHERE ("source_id"  =~ /[^.]+\.[^.]+\.${DLH}/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY="partition_id" where $timeFilter
list.label: Partition name
list.name: partition
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY="partition_id" where $timeFilter

list.definition: SELECT "source_id" FROM (SELECT "rate_payloads_consumed", "source_id" FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE partition_id = '${partition}' AND $timeFilter)
list.label: Readout application
list.name: readout_app
list.query: SELECT "source_id" FROM (SELECT "rate_payloads_consumed", "source_id" FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE partition_id = '${partition}' AND $timeFilter)

list.definition: SELECT "source_id" FROM (SELECT "rate_payloads_consumed", "source_id" FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE partition_id = '${partition}' AND "source_id" =~/[^.]+\.${readout_app}\.[^.]+/ AND $timeFilter)
list.name: DLH
list.query: SELECT "source_id" FROM (SELECT "rate_payloads_consumed", "source_id" FROM "dunedaq.datahandlinglibs.readoutinfo.ReadoutInfo" WHERE partition_id = '${partition}' AND "source_id" =~/[^.]+\.${readout_app}\.[^.]+/ AND $timeFilter)
